caption: I come here and eat at this place all the time. They have lots of variety of food to choose from and all taste excellent. I highly recommend this place. In my opinion, it is the best food court out of all the H-Mart.
I highly recommended this place. They have a great quality Korean food and very delicious.
Love the place! Waited for the long line but it is valuable.  I feel like I am eating Korean food in Korea :)

I ordered for takeout 8 pcs fried wings and 8 pcs wings with spicy sauce. It wasn't freshly fried, they just fried one more time which was already fried before. I won't buy fried chicken again there. I'd rather go KFC for fried chicken. Too much bread on wings and too dried meat. You'll regret, if you go there for fried chicken.
no star if i can。Not enough epidemic prevention，Food quality is not good, poor management, never again。Blood in my chicken。

Tasty and crunchy. The soy garlic much better than the regular fried chicken, which had good texture but almost no flavor. Overall, not as good as Korean fried chicken from flushing, but pretty good for long island

Usually when I'm here I pass up the long lines and continue shopping at H Mart, telling myself I'll try it next time. I finally came in and the line wasn't ridiculously long, so we ordered. I'm happy to finally find a seafood udon on the island that reminds me of what I used to find in Koreatown Los Angeles. My girlfriend had the spicy beef soup, and after trying a spoonful we're both on fire. It's delicious, and the flavors really shine after a few bites. After sampling their friend chicken, I think we'll be back soon just for an order of that.
The worst fried chicken！Never touch it。
The food was terrible, tasted like it was frozen and I saw one of the chef drop some rice and then pick it up and put it on the tray. Disgusting

This place should be under investigation by the NYS Health Department. DO NOT eat here! I found a piece of metal (like from a sponge or something) in my food (noodle) but when I complained, the worker or the manager said, prove that it's from the food!!! I brought the bowl after eating for about 5 minutes and I was told to prove that the metal was from their food! Why would I have a metal string with me when I went to eat there for lunch??  I used to come here after they opened, and it was fine. But now, the food tastes completely different. The workers are very rude! I  complained to H Mart but I was told that the restaurant is separate. Well, H Mart should have a better food court hired than this one for sure. I know how Korean food should taste like - but when I said that to the worker, the worker there said, well, the Americans don't! I wish I can tell this to all non-korean people so they know that this is not how Korean food should taste like!

We had chicken, griled squid and rice. After eating the food, about two hours later, we both had a major stomachache and ended up going to the bathroom a few times all night long. I thought it was only me, but my friend told me she also hadn't eaten anything all day, and had only eaten at K Town Food market. The food here seems very unsanitary. Later, we found out the others had the similar issues and stopped eating there. We will never go back. I learned that this place has nothing to do with H Mart, which is a great news because we like H Mart. This food court is a MUST AVOID place. Bad service as well - the workers there didn't say sorry when we called. Instead, they said, stop complaining after eating everything - who knew we would become sick!!

Ate here and the kids were food poisoned. The manager or the owner didn't seem to care - asked us not to here here and go eat somewhere else if we'd complain. No apologies whatsoever. The food tastes very different from how it used to be when it first opened two years ago. The food is full with MSG. We will no longer be giving them our business.

I like A16, spicy squid and pork rice dish. I crave this dish. It's spicy. It's filling. It's good.  This "food court" restaurant is inside of HMart. There is seating--you might have to wait a bit if it's crowded. There's no table service, other than the tables being wiped down in between customers. Customers return their own dishes and trays to the return area. There's a restroom in the HMart supermarket section of the building (front, past the cashiers). This place works for me. Quick and reasonable.
Better than one flushing experience I had, ask for the banchan if it comes with your dish...

Food seems to be getting worse month after month.   I work nearby and there are not many Korean eateries nearby so I go very often...at least 2-3 times a week.  I've tried every single item on the menu and have been coming ever since they opened...however, in the recent months, the food has been getting worse and worse.   Maybe they keep changing the chef????  Now I go only 2-3 times a month.   Inconsistent!!!!
If you're not Korean you won't be treated well. The stuff is expensive. It does have a nice range of stuff to choose from. They need to check their racist attitudes.
They had problems with their grill when I went so I had a limited selection. However I was extremely happy with what I got - A5 with was the beef and vegetables over rice aka bimbop
